name: Nischith B O
title: QA Automation | DevOps | 4+  Years Experience
summary:
With over 4 years of experience in Software Development in Test (SDET) and DevOps, I am a Master’s graduate student at the University of Florida.

I specialize in Java, Python, cloud infrastructure, and automation. Skilled in building CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and improving software testing practices, I am passionate about optimizing software delivery and enhancing system reliability.

I’m currently seeking SDET and DevOps roles where I can leverage my experience to drive automation and continuous improvement.
